Description: Cornelian hand amulet, with loop for suspension at wrist.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.58. J.H. Taylor & D. Antoine, Ancient lives, new discoveries, London 2014, p. 110.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1994 / Amulets of Ancient Egypt (p. 71 & fig. 67)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 13 Oct-1998 5 Jan, India, New Delhi, National Museum, The Enduring Image 1998 9 Feb-3 May, India, Mumbai, Sir Caswasjee Jahangir Hall, The Enduring Image 2014-15 22 May to 19 April, London, British Museum, 'Ancient Lives, New Discoveries'
